author: Sarah Johnson
content: Excellent service! Our plumbing business saw a 40% increase in leads after using their marketing templates.

responseTemplates.name: Thank You Template
responseTemplates.content: Thank you for your feedback! We're thrilled to hear about your success.

responseTemplates.name: Follow-up Template
responseTemplates.content: We appreciate your review! Let us know if there's anything else we can do to help your business grow.

author: Michael Chen
content: Good analytics dashboard, but could use more detailed ROI breakdowns for medical practices.

responseTemplates.name: Feature Request Template
responseTemplates.content: Thank you for your suggestion! We're always working to improve our analytics features.

author: Emily Rodriguez
content: The campaign wizard saved us hours of setup time. Our legal practice acquired 15 new clients last month!

responseTemplates.name: Success Template
responseTemplates.content: We're so happy to hear about your success! Keep up the great work with your campaigns.

author: David Thompson
content: Mobile responsive design needs improvement - some template elements looked distorted on smaller screens.

responseTemplates.name: Issue Resolution Template
responseTemplates.content: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Our team is working on improving mobile responsiveness.

author: Linda Park
content: Effective social media scheduler, though the content suggestions could be more profession-specific.

responseTemplates.name: Improvement Template
responseTemplates.content: We appreciate your feedback! We're enhancing our content suggestions to be more tailored to specific professions.

author: James Wilson
content: The review-to-testimonial converter is a game changer! Our conversion rates improved dramatically.

responseTemplates.name: Feature Appreciation Template
responseTemplates.content: We're thrilled that you're finding value in our testimonial converter feature!

author: Karen Miller
content: Had issues with API integration for our dental practice. Support response was slow.

responseTemplates.name: Support Template
responseTemplates.content: We apologize for the inconvenience. Our support team is investigating the API integration issue.

author: Robert Smith
content: Great value for small businesses. The performance dashboard helps us track marketing ROI effectively.

responseTemplates.name: Appreciation Template
responseTemplates.content: Thank you for your kind words! We're glad our dashboard is helping you track your marketing success.

author: Jessica Brown
content: Frustrating experience with template customization - limited options for legal websites.

responseTemplates.name: Escalation Template
responseTemplates.content: We sincerely apologize for your experience. Our design team will reach out to assist you directly.

author: Daniel Kim
content: Useful platform overall, but wish the analytics updated in real-time instead of daily batches.

responseTemplates.name: Update Template
responseTemplates.content: Thank you for the feedback! We're exploring real-time analytics features for future updates.
